product.title: Maggie's Grinning Soul
product.description: Maggie's Grinning Soul is a short investigation game made for the 37th Ludum Dare
product.history: This game was made on Unity. I was the only programmer in a team of 8 students. Basically, the game is a hidden object game : you find an object, it unlocks questions, one question will unlock an object, and so on. I had to make the game system, but also all the graphic and sound integration. Since the game system was simple, the game jam ran smoothly, and I had time to sleep and debug the game !

features.feature: It ended 20th on LD's Overall rating
